thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Sharon Pazzaglia Pintwala
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Sharon Pazzaglia Pintwala

author: Sharon Pazzaglia Pintwala
title: Sharon Pazzaglia Pintwala
text:
My first experience with Mabel's labels!
I am VERY disappointed with the size.
HALF the size of a postage stamp...
Howerver; I am very impressed with their service and concern for customer satisfaction!!
Mable's labels contacted me immediately and offered to switch for another product. They also stated the size fits on labels of clothing and will therefore be able to be washed without losing the sticker!
I will keep the stickers and use them as intended!
